title: BRIEF-Square Inc Q4 Net Loss Per Share $0.04
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Square Inc:
* NET LOSS PER SHARE WAS $0.04 ON BOTH A BASIC AND DILUTED BASIS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2017
* IN THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2017, PROCESSED $17.9 BILLION OF GPV, AN INCREASE OF 31% FROM THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2016.
* QTRLY ‍​TOTAL NET REVENUE WAS $616 MILLION, UP 36% * ADJUSTED EPS WAS $0.08 IN Q4 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.07, REVENUE VIEW $266.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES ‍Q1 NET INCOME LOSS PER SHARE $0.09 TO $0.07 * PROCESSED $17.9 BILLION OF GPV IN Q4, AN INCREASE OF 31% * SEES Q1 ADJUSTED EPS OF $0.03 TO $0.05 * SEES FY18 NET INCOME LOSS PER SHARE $0.08 TO $0.04 * SEES FY ADJUSTED EPS OF $0.43 TO $0.47 * SEES Q1‍​ ADJUSTED REVENUE $290 MILLION TO $295 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08, REVENUE VIEW $271.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.45, REVENUE VIEW $1.28 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY ADJUSTED REVENUE $1.30 BILLION TO $1.33 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.07, REVENUE VIEW $266.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08, REVENUE VIEW $271.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text ( squ.re/2AlRpyb ) Further company coverage:
